scripts.lint: npm run format:php && npm run lint:php && npm run lint:js
scripts.dist: composer install --no-dev && rm -rf dist && gulp dist && composer install
scripts.make:zip: npm run dist && npm run zip
scripts.phpunit: composer install && wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd='wp-content/plugins/vk-add-link-parameter' vendor/bin/phpunit -c .phpunit.xml --testsuite default
